RelatedSentence: In Guyana , he will meet Guyana 's foreign affairs minister , Carolyn Rodrigues - Birkett , Caricom Secretary General Irwin LaRocque , and attend the third Caricom - Spain mixed commission .
Spain 's foreign minister is also expected to ask for Caricom 's support of its candidacy to the Security Council for the period 2015 to 2016 .

In courting Caricom , Ambassador Fernández López de Turiso has promised that from its seat on the UN Security Council , Spain will look out for its friends in the Caribbean and be a loyal defender of Caribbean interests .
